revised_title: Description of Scarlet Birds and Their Characteristics
tldr: In a letter to Dr. Tancred Robinson, Edward Lhwyd describes the appearance and behavior of scarlet birds found in Pembrokeshire. The male birds have a deep scarlet color, while the females have a grey head and back with a lovely scarlet breast. These birds are said to be very tame and feed intensively, not moving much from their places.
